title: Downtown Logistics Center
description:
Modern logistics facility located in the heart of Miami's industrial district. This state-of-the-art warehouse offers 25,000 square feet of premium storage space with 30-foot clear heights and 24 loading docks for efficient operations.

The facility features ESFR sprinkler systems, LED lighting throughout, and climate-controlled areas perfect for sensitive inventory. The property includes 2,500 sq ft of office space, conference rooms, and employee amenities.

Strategically located with easy access to I-95 and major transportation routes, this warehouse is ideal for distribution, logistics, or light manufacturing operations. The secure, gated facility offers 24/7 access and monitoring.
metaTitle: Downtown Miami Warehouse for Lease - 25,000 sq ft
metaDescription: Premium 25,000 sq ft warehouse space for lease in Miami. Features 24 loading docks, 30ft ceilings, climate control. Perfect for logistics and distribution.
